ygData.subject: RE: Mana song in battle
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That s exactly that reason I m scared to death to even consider any form of AE control/attacks.  I m just too frail these days. When I yell at the tank and
ygData.messageBody:
> This is the order in which the players should stand from the battle.
> Lullaby puts you at #1 with every non-engaged mob.

That's exactly that reason I'm scared to death to even consider
any form of AE control/attacks. I'm just too frail these days.

When I yell at the tank and say man, you are down to two bubbles
back out a little, I've got some health to burn up, and he comes
back with 2 bubbles is about 1100 hp, and I'm full health at 1200.

"Be my guest, sir..." heheheh.

Harmonic.
